HOME

/$
$
CONTACT US
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
$
PRIVATE PARTIES
/$
$
No two parties are the same. That's why Hell 'n Blazes offers eclectic spaces to host celebrations of various sizes. Our venue in historic downtown Melbourne has unique settings for both private and semi-private gatherings. Whether you want to celebrate a milestone, mingle with friends, connect over beers, or host a gathering with your family, Hell 'n Blazes has it all.
/$
$
More Details
/$
$
Inquire About a Party
/$
$
CATERING MENU
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
CORPORATE EVENTS
/$
$
Forget the stuffy ballroom or just another office meeting!  Hell 'n Blazes thrives by supporting local Florida businesses interested in using the taproom for meetings, presentations, and team building.
​
Our Vault Room
comfortably seats 20-30 guests with table space. The 75" TV provides the presentation tool to engage the whole group.​ We offer the taproom during off-hours for larger groups to allow your team the workspace it needs!  Our patio is now available for private gatherings as well.
/$
$
More Details
/$
$
Inquire About an Event
/$
$
CATERING MENU
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
WEDDINGS
/$
$
Unite your love in the Sunshine State! Escape to the enchanting world of love and craft beer at our Florida brewery wedding venue! Imagine exchanging vows surrounded by the rustic charm of our brewery, savoring craft beer brewed on-site, delighting in delectable cuisine, and dancing the night away in our spacious areas and outdoor patio. Create unforgettable memories in a setting that perfectly blends romance and relaxed vibes.
/$
$
